title: 'Often imitated but never duplicated': The anti-Terrible Towel movement isn't rattling the Steelers
description: Several Steelers road opponents have given away towels to counteract the fans with Terrible Towels who show up to cheer on Pittsburgh.
author: Brooke Pryor

title: Nick Chubb's gruesome knee injury made a stadium gasp, and his recovery inspired a team
description: Chubb's long road back from a second major knee injury has lifted the Browns amid a disappointing season.
author: Daniel Oyefusi

title: 'Maybe the four defeats was why' - Guardiola signs new deal
description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola signs a two-year contract extension to keep him at the club until 2027.

title: Verstappen defends 'on-the-limit' driving during title fight
description: Max Verstappen tells BBC Sport in Las Vegas about the approach that has brought him to the cusp of a fourth world title.

title: 'Demanding, intense, authentic': Inside Amorim's first week at Man Utd
description: The irony was not lost on Manchester United staff.

title: Amad's edge on Garnacho and Rashford at Man Utd

description: Pittsburgh is coming off a huge win over Baltimore and looks to stay in the race for the AFC's No. 1 seed. Can the Browns pull an upset? Follow it all here!

title: NBA All-Star Game to adopt pickup-style format for 4-team tournament: Report
description: This season's NBA All-Star Game will reportedly have a much different look to increase competitiveness.
